name: tuna briouates
ingredients: 3 individual portions of cream cheese (e.g., St MÃ´ret)
steps: Mix the tuna with the cream cheese. Add pepper (no need for salt, the cheese is already salty).
Cut the brick pastry sheets in half (into semi-circles). Fold each half in two (to form a strip).
Place the filling at one end and fold into a triangle (briouate).
Brown them in a bit of butter (in a pan) or bake them in the oven (healthier) until crispy. Drain and serve hot.
